property.name: dfs.namenode.shared.edits.dir
property.description: A directory on shared storage between the multiple namenodes in an HA cluster. This directory will be written by the active and read by the standby in order to keep the namespaces synchronized. This directory does not need to be listed in dfs.namenode.edits.dir above. It should be left empty in a non-HA cluster.设置JournalNode服务器地址，QuorumJournalManager 用于存储editlog
